name: SILVR Social
description:
SILVR is a boutique digital marketing agency located in the Solana Beach Design District in Southern California.
We are a team comprised of digital marketing strategists, soulful storytellers, ROI evangelists, media buying maniacs, passionate writers, creative connoisseurs, guardians of grammar, tagline fanatics, and masters of implementation.
Our team is committed to a true work/play balance, allowing us to approach every project with a holistic blend of professionalism, creativity, and heart.
